summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York regarding preparation of a 3500 material packet, discovery, and exhibits for an upcoming case, likely related to the Epstein investigation. It shows coordination among prosecutors to finalize materials for distribution.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, coordinating the final review and distribution of 3500 materials, discovery, and exhibits.

events.title: Final review and distribution of 3500 materials
events.description: The Assistant United States Attorney plans to conduct a final review of the 3500 materials, discovery, and exhibits, along with corresponding cover letters, for distribution.

keyFacts: An Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York is preparing 3500 materials, discovery, and exhibits for distribution.
The email indicates ongoing legal proceedings related to the Epstein case as of November 2021.
The communication shows internal coordination within the U.S. Attorney's Office to finalize case materials.
